overview: Winter Santos is recovering from a violent abusive romantic relationship with her ex Joey. A year after the relationship has ended, Winter finds herself creating her own family of sorts. She often sits and talks to Bernie the neighborhood uncle. Winter practices fire-escape yoga with her nosey neighbor Tata and battles her addictions with her new family she has built. Living now with Harold her closeted bestie who's going to need to tell Vanessa about the man he's been lusting after. Her own best practices lead her to meditating in the park and by chance or as if by Divine intervention she runs into her estranged sisters Ivette and Sky. Winter tries everything to win their trust but there's a lot of healing left to do.
tagline: With family goodbye isn't forever, you just might wish it was.
title: The Divine Intervention
